column5: Hey guys how's it going.....new to the forum....Had to wait a week and a half for the verification to go through but i'm in at last...... I do a lot of Lake Erie pickerel, and Kawarthas musky fishing ....trying my luck in the wind this weekend at Lake St Clair for the first time. just looking for some live release photos and that great thrill.... Any insight from local guys who fish there would be great.  Cheers
With the current forecast. I wouldn't be out there on Sat in my boat. 30-40km winds
Mitchell Bay might give you some protection from the wind but not a lot.  There are some in there.  In the channels between the reeds there are big walleye and catfish and bass if you get blown off.
